definitions.definition: In a horrible way; very badly .
examples: The beginning art students displayed their horribly executed paintings with hopeful faces.

definitions.definition: To an extreme degree or extent.
examples: The man was horribly nice, yet she still wouldn't marry him.
labels: often modifying a negative adverb or adjective
definitions.label_groups: degree , often modifying a negative adverb or adjective

examples: Horribly , as he was dying, his eyes reddened.

main_definition: ( manner ) In a horrible way; very badly .
secondary_definitions: ( degree , often modifying a negative adverb or adjective ) To an extreme degree or extent.
( evaluative ) With a very bad effect.
